name: Alternating Push-Up
description: Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Etiam porta sem malesuada magna mollis euismod. Donec sed odio dui.
focuses: HANDS UNDER SHOULDERS WITH FINGERS FACING FORWARD OR SLIGHTLY INWARD
HEAD ALIGNED WITH SPINE AT ALL TIMES WITH EYES LOOKING SLIGHTLY AHEAD
ELBOWS CLOSE TO BODY OR FLARED OUTSIDE SLIGHTLY AT LEAST AT 90 DEGREES OR LESS
LOW BACK & RIBCAGE AVOID SAGGING DOWN
HIPS ALIGNED WITH SPINE AT ALL TIMES
SHOULDER BLADES PULLED DOWN YOUR BACK
